data.actual_result: The thumbnail fails to reduce and keeps its original size
data.expected_result: It should be consistent and always show the thumbnail reducing animation
data.short_description: Thumbnail reducing animation fails when un-selecting and re-selecting a file quickly
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with write permissions - Tap "+" icon - Select an image. Notice that when you select it it makes an animation where the thumbnail becomes smaller - Now double-tap on the selected image, so that it's un-selected and re-selected quickly
